The LCONRG Project¶

A Project which calculates the Levelised Cost Of eNeRGy.

Installation¶

To install the LCONRG project, run this command in your terminal:

$ pip install lconrg

Usage¶

LCONRG usage looks like:

>>> lconrg [OPTIONS]
-l <language>, --language <language>¶

The Wikipedia language edition, as identified by its subdomain on wikipedia.org. By default, the English Wikipedia is selected.

--version¶

Display the version and exit.

--help¶

Display a short usage message and exit.

LCONRG
